name: AlphaConverter
0:
”Alexa, ask Alpha Converter 30 percent”
”Alexa, ask Alpha Converter 50 percent in hex”
”Alexa, ask Alpha Converter 90 percent in decimal”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alpha converter
des: Some graphic tools use percent for alpha, or opacity. So if you want to change percent to color code in either hexadecimal or decimal, just say "Alexa, ask Alpha Converter 30 percent in hex".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
